survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of corporate training programs offered by the organization, identifying strengths and areas for improvement to enhance employee learning and development.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the corporate training programs offered by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure options are balanced for unbiased responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the corporate training programs offered by your organization?

questions.question_text: Which of the following training programs have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse participation. Include 'None of the above' for respondents who haven't participated.

script.question_text: Which of the following training programs have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How well do the training programs align with your job responsibilities and career goals?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to assess alignment with job roles and career aspirations.

script.question_text: How well do the training programs align with your job responsibilities and career goals?

questions.question_text: What is the primary format of the training programs you have attended?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one training program in Q2
questions.client_notes: Include an open-ended 'Other' option for unlisted formats.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an open-text 'Other' option.

script.question_text: What is the primary format of the training programs you have attended?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one training program in Q2

questions.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' format mentioned in Q4.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Other (please specify)' is selected in Q4
questions.client_notes: Open-ended field for additional input. Ensure it's optional.

script.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' format mentioned in Q4.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Other (please specify)' is selected in Q4

questions.question_text: How effective are the training materials (e.g., handouts, slides, videos) in supporting your learning?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one training program in Q2
questions.client_notes: Another 5-point Likert scale to evaluate material effectiveness.

script.question_text: How effective are the training materials (e.g., handouts, slides, videos) in supporting your learning?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one training program in Q2

questions.question_text: How would you rate the relevance and practicality of the skills/knowledge gained from the training programs?
answer_options: Not at all relevant or practical
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one training program in Q2
questions.client_notes: Assess perceived value of training outcomes.

script.question_text: How would you rate the relevance and practicality of the skills/knowledge gained from the training programs?
answer_options: Not at all relevant or practical
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one training program in Q2

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, have prevented you from participating in more training programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of time due to workload
None, I participate as much as needed
questions.client_notes: Identify common obstacles to training participation.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, have prevented you from participating in more training programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of time due to workload
None, I participate as much as needed

questions.question_text: How often does your manager or supervisor discuss training opportunities with you?
questions.client_notes: Measure managerial engagement in employee development.

script.question_text: How often does your manager or supervisor discuss training opportunities with you?

questions.question_text: What topics or skills would you like to see included in future training programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for future programs.

script.question_text: What topics or skills would you like to see included in future training programs?
